Author: beautifulgoats
Text: Thanks for the advice. I'll just keep drinking water then and hope I feel better later.

Author: niquiss
Text: When I'm in situations like this I usually drink a lot of water, it makes me feel better knowing that I'll "pee it all away" even tho it's not really like that. I feel better seeing that my pee is crystal clear even after binging lol and sometimes I drink so much that I'll also shit quite a lot heh... if you can find a lemon at your bf's you should drink some if possible.
